test.title: Verify that the website logo displays correctly on the homepage.

custom.preconds: User is on the homepage
custom.steps: 1. Open the website homepage in a browser
custom.expected: Website logo is visible and displayed correctly in the header

test.title: Verify that the "Book this room" button on the homepage navigates to the booking page.

custom.preconds: User is on the homepage
custom.steps:
1. Locate the "Book this room" button
2. Click on the button
custom.expected: User is redirected to the booking page

test.title: Verify that footer links (Privacy Policy) navigate to the respective pages.

custom.preconds: User is on the homepage
custom.steps:
1. Scroll to the footer of the page
2. Click on the “Privacy Policy” link
custom.expected: User is redirected to the Privacy Policy page

test.title: Verify that the homepage is responsive on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

custom.preconds: Access to various devices or browser dev tools
custom.steps: 1. Open the homepage on different device sizes or simulate using developer tools
custom.expected: Homepage layout and content adjust appropriately to each screen size

test.title: Verify that the layout of homepage UI elements remains consistent across browsers.

custom.preconds: Supported browsers installed (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge)
custom.steps:
1. Open the homepage in each browser
2. Compare the layout and functionality
custom.expected: The UI layout appears consistently and functions correctly in all browsers

test.title: Verify that the room catalog displays a list of available rooms with basic details (room type).

custom.preconds: User is on the room catalog page
custom.steps:
1. Navigate to the room catalog page.
2. Observe the list of displayed rooms
custom.expected: Each room in the list displays room type

test.title: Verify that the room catalog displays a list of available rooms with basic details (image).

custom.preconds: User is on the room catalog page
custom.steps:
1. Navigate to the room catalog page.
2. Observe the list of displayed rooms.
custom.expected: Each room in the list displays image

test.title: Verify that the room catalog displays a list of available rooms with basic details (description).

custom.preconds: User is on the room catalog page
custom.steps:
1. Navigate to the room catalog page.
2. Observe the list of displayed rooms.
custom.expected: Each room in the list displays short description.

change.comment: Room description is not in English on the Room page
Room description is not in English on the Room page

test.title: Verify that pagination works correctly in the room catalog.

custom.preconds: More rooms than one page limit (10 rooms)
custom.steps:
1. Scroll to the bottom of the room catalog.
2. Click “Next” or a numbered page link.
custom.expected: New set of room listings is loaded; the current page indicator updates.

test.title: Verify that filtering rooms by type (Single) displays appropriate results.

custom.preconds: Filter options are available on the catalog page
custom.steps:
Select a room type filter (“Single”).
Apply the filter.
custom.expected: Only rooms of the selected type are displayed.

test.title: Verify that filtering rooms by type (Double) displays appropriate results.
Verify that room images load correctly and with proper resolution

custom.preconds: Rooms have associated images
custom.steps:
1. Navigate to the room catalog.
2. Observe images for several rooms.
custom.expected: All room images are displayed clearly, with no broken or low-resolution images.

test.title: Verify that each room listing shows availability status

custom.preconds: Rooms have up-to-date availability data
custom.steps:
1. Navigate to the room catalog.
2. Look at the availability label or tag on each room.
custom.expected: Each room clearly displays whether it is available or booked.

test.title: Verify that the room booking calendar displays available dates correctly.

custom.preconds: Room availability is pre-configured
custom.steps:
1. Navigate to the booking page.
2. View the calendar.
custom.expected: Available dates are enabled and visually distinct from unavailable dates.

test.title: Verify that the user can select available dates on the booking calendar.

custom.preconds: Booking calendar is displayed with available dates
custom.steps:
1. Click on an available check-in date.
2. Click on a valid check-out date.
custom.expected: Selected dates are highlighted and registered in the form

test.title: Verify that the system prevents booking on unavailable dates.

custom.preconds: Some dates are marked as unavailable
custom.steps: 1. Try selecting an unavailable or disabled date.
custom.expected: System blocks selection and optionally displays tooltip or message.

test.title: Verify that the booking form accepts valid guest information.

custom.preconds: Booking form is visible
custom.steps:
1. Fill in guest name, valid email, and phone number.
2. Submit the form.
custom.expected: Form submits without validation errors

test.title: Verify that the booking form validates required fields (guest name, email).

custom.preconds: Booking form is accessible
custom.steps:
1. Leave guest name and email empty.
2. Click submit.
custom.expected: Validation messages appear under required fields

test.title: Verify that the user can select a room type during the booking process.

custom.preconds: At least two room types are available
custom.steps: 1. Select a room type from the dropdown or list.
custom.expected: Selected room type appears in the booking summary

test.title: Verify that a booking summary displays the selected room and dates accurately.

custom.preconds: User has selected dates and room type
custom.steps: 1. Scroll to the booking summary area.
custom.expected: Summary reflects correct room type, check-in, and check-out

test.title: Verify that the booking form allows modification of booking details before submission.

custom.preconds: Booking form is filled with initial data
custom.steps:
1. Edit dates or guest info.
1. Review the updated summary.
custom.expected: Changes are reflected immediately

test.title: Verify that a booking can be successfully submitted and a confirmation page is displayed.

custom.preconds: Booking form is filled with valid data
custom.steps: Click “Book Now”
custom.expected: Confirmation page displays with booking ID and summary

test.title: Verify that a booking confirmation email is simulated successfully.

custom.preconds: System supports simulated email delivery
custom.steps: 1. Complete a booking with a valid email.
custom.expected: simulated confirmation email is triggered (or logged)

test.title: Verify that the booking cancellation process via the user account functions as expected.

custom.preconds: User is logged in and has an active booking
custom.steps:
1. Navigate to “My Bookings”.
2. Click “Cancel Booking”.
custom.expected: Booking status updates to “Cancelled

test.title: Verify that error messages are displayed when invalid booking data is entered.

custom.preconds: Booking form is open
custom.steps:
1. Enter invalid email or incomplete data.
2. Submit form.
custom.expected: Proper error messages are shown next to invalid fields

test.title: Verify that the system correctly handles simultaneous booking attempts.

custom.preconds: Two users try to book the same room/date at the same time
custom.steps: 1.Submit both forms simultaneously.
custom.expected: One booking succeeds; the other receives an availability error

test.title: Verify that the booking form is responsive and works on mobile devices.

custom.preconds: User accesses the form on a mobile screen
custom.steps: 1.Navigate to booking page on mobile or emulate mobile in browser.
custom.expected: Layout adapts, form remains functional and readable

test.title: Verify that the contact form loads correctly on the website.

custom.preconds: User is on the "Contact Us" form
custom.steps: 1. Navigate to the Contact Form.
custom.expected: Contact form displays without layout or loading issues

test.title: Verify that all required fields (name, email, message,phone) are present in the contact form.

custom.preconds: Contact form is visible
custom.steps: 1. Observe the fields on the form.
custom.expected: Fields for Name, Email, Phone, and Message are present and marked as required

test.title: Verify that entering valid input in the contact form is accepted.

custom.preconds: Contact form is loaded
custom.steps:
1. Fill in all fields with valid data.
2. Submit the form.
custom.expected: Form is submitted without errors

test.title: Verify that leaving a required field empty triggers a validation error.

custom.preconds: Contact form is visible
custom.steps:
1. Leave one required field (e.g., email) empty.
2. Submit the form.
custom.expected: Error message appears indicating the field is required

test.title: Verify that the email field validates the correct email format.

custom.preconds: Contact form is open
custom.steps:
1.Enter an invalid email (example@gmail.com)
2. and submit
custom.expected: Email field triggers validation error about invalid format

test.defects: https://ibosite.atlassian.net/jira/software/projects/CPG/boards/1?selectedIssue=CPG-9, Room description is not in English on the Room page

change.defects: Room description is not in English on the Room page

change.comment: Email field does not validate incorrect email format

test.title: Verify that a message can be successfully submitted through the contact form.

custom.preconds: Contact form is filled with valid data
custom.steps: 1.Submit the form.
custom.expected: The message is sent successfully and backend/API responds with success status

test.title: Verify that a confirmation message is displayed upon successful submission of the contact form.

custom.preconds: Valid message submitted
custom.steps: 1. Submit the form with correct data.
custom.expected: A “Thank you” or confirmation message appears on the page

test.title: Verify that the contact form displays correctly on mobile devices.

custom.preconds: Access website using a mobile browser
custom.steps: 1. Navigate to Contact page.
custom.expected: Form is responsive and elements are readable and aligned

test.title: Verify that an error message is displayed when the contact form submission fails due to network issues.

custom.preconds: imulate a network failure or disable internet temporarily
custom.steps: 1. Submit the form with valid data while offline.
custom.expected: Error message like “Submission failed. Please try again later” appears
